definition: Shangri-La (mythical location)/Shangri-La town and county in Dêqên or Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Yunnan/formerly Gyeltang or Gyalthang, Chinese 中甸[Zhong1 dian4] in Tibetan province of Kham
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Li (surname)
lining/interior/inside/internal/also written 裏|里[li3]
variant of 裡|里[li3]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

Shangri-La county in Dêqên or Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Yunnan/formerly Gyeltang or Gyalthang, Chinese 中甸[Zhong1 dian4] in Tibetan province of Kham

sentences.english: The party secretary says he wants to turn the "city village" of Huaxi into a Shangri-la.
sentences.chinese: 他表示自己想把华西村建设成香格里拉。

sentences.english: Tiger Leaping Gorge, we were caught in a traffic due to debris flow.
sentences.chinese: 从香格里拉到虎跳峡的路上，因泥石流出现堵车。

sentences.english: Do you want to know more about shangrila ?
sentences.chinese: 想了解更多的香格里拉吗？

sentences.english: We went back to visit Lijiang and Shangrila.
sentences.chinese: 我们重游了丽江和香格里拉。

sentences.english: Everyone has a SHANGRI-LA in heart. But SHANGRI-LA is unique, where is my SHANGRI-LA?
sentences.chinese: 每个人心中都有一个香格里拉，我的在哪里呢？

sentences.english: Songtsam also has two comfortable hotels in the area now known as Shangri-la.
sentences.chinese: 松赞在香格里拉也拥有两家舒适的酒店。

sentences.english: If we lose the human side of our world, in the end, we still have to find Shangrila and bring.
sentences.chinese: 如果失去了自我的世界，最终，我们将再寻香格里拉。

sentences.english: Also includes Wuhan Tianhe Airport, the Intermediate People's Court, Shangri-La Hotel, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 还包括武汉天河机场，中级法院，香格里拉大饭店等。
香格里拉在藏语中的意思是理想的天堂。

sentences.english: The second one is the Shangri-La route in the northwest Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 二是滇西北香格里拉旅游热线。

sentences.english: Would you tell me shangrila hotel's number?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我香格里拉饭店的号码吗？

sentences.english: Shangri-la is an ideal land for the harmonious coexistence between man and nature.
sentences.chinese: “香格里拉”是人与自然和谐共生的理想境地。

sentences.english: As we approached Shangri-la, the concentration of large wooden frame. Tibetan-style. houses grew in number.
sentences.chinese: 愈接近香格里拉，大型木制的藏屋群就愈多。

sentences.english: Nice to meet you, hasta la vista.
sentences.chinese: 见到你很高兴，直到香格里拉景色。

sentences.english: BeiJin Shangri-La restaurant sincerely welcome you to get one of the listed posts.
sentences.chinese: 北京香格里拉饭店诚挚地欢迎您应聘列出的职位。

sentences.english: Next month is Kowloon Shangri-la's 30 years anniversary, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 正逢，下个月是九龙香格里拉大酒店30周年纪念。

Lijiang old town (in Yunnan)
Xinduqiao town in Dartsendo county 康定縣|康定县[Kang1 ding4 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan
Mt Yulong or Jade dragon in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
Lake Mibgai Co or Miga Tso, in Dartsendo or Kangding 康定[Kang1 ding4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan
